page.title: 11EATING OUT IN WESTCOTT
page.content: This survey is based on answers from 25 people in Westcott and Wotton. From the results of our survey in Westcott and Wotton. We found that 60% of the local people eat out on special occasions and the remainder celebrate with the family at home. Out of those who go out for a meal, more than half prefer to eat at a restauraunt rather than a pub. The majority of people prefer to eat a full meal rather than a snack. We found that older people prefer the tradional meal with meat and vegetables. Only one person we asked did not cook regularly at home. Nearly 10% of those we asked were {vegetarians.} A meal at{Wotton Hatch on Christmas day costs Â£21.00 adults Â£10.00 children. Any other day it costs Â£12.00 a head. At{The Crown, Westcott a meal would cost from 75p to Â£4.25.
